item.title: Retrieve CDP/LLDP info
item.description: Search for an easy way to get CDP/LLDP info for any given ESXi physical port (vmnic)? Here it is! It relies on ObnTransformation from my previous post and also depends on PowerShell Community Extensions for ?? alias (Invoke-NullCoalescing). You can replace the latter with the simple if in case you don’t have PSCX installed. Keep in mind that (some) devices return MAC instead of the management IP in LLDP info.
